analyses.title: Hard Architecture Mapping: BAML (Boundary ML)
analyses.description: Comprehensive technical architecture analysis of BAML's DSL compiler infrastructure, multi-language runtime, and Schema-Aligned Parsing (SAP) algorithm
analyses.author: GitHub Copilot
analyses.strategic_context: Establishes ground truth of BAML's technical implementation as compiler-first infrastructure

analyses.title: Decision Forensics: BAML (Boundary ML)
analyses.description: Investigation of architectural decisions, trade-offs, and strategic rationale behind BAML's design choices
analyses.author: GitHub Copilot
analyses.strategic_context: Traces the 'why' behind key decisions: Rust core, DSL syntax, SAP algorithm, multi-language support

analyses.title: Anti-Library: BAML (Boundary ML)
analyses.description: Documentation of what BAML deliberately chose NOT to build - the 'roads not taken' that reveal strategic discipline
analyses.author: GitHub Copilot
analyses.strategic_context: 19 major feature categories deliberately not built, revealing focus and architectural integrity

analyses.title: Vision Alignment: BAML (Boundary ML)
analyses.description: Assessment of alignment between stated vision and actual implementation, revealing exceptional integrity (93%)
analyses.author: GitHub Copilot
analyses.strategic_context: 93% vision-reality alignment demonstrates engineering honesty and under-promise/over-deliver strategy

process_memory.title: Process Memory: BAML Investigation
process_memory.description: Epistemic history documenting the investigator's journey from skepticism to recognition of BAML as paradigm-shifting infrastructure
process_memory.author: GitHub Copilot
process_memory.strategic_context: Documents evolution from 'DSL is overkill' to 'DSL enables multi-language compiler architecture'

distillations.title: Meta-Pattern Synthesis: BAML
distillations.description: Universal patterns extracted from BAML that apply broadly to software engineering and product development
distillations.author: GitHub Copilot
distillations.strategic_context: 12 meta-patterns including: Compiler-First Infrastructure, Constraint Exploitation, Anti-Library Strategy, Engineering Honesty as Moat

distillations.title: Paradigm Extraction: BAML
distillations.description: Fundamental paradigm shifts revealed by BAML that define post-imperative, compiler-driven AI development
distillations.author: GitHub Copilot
distillations.strategic_context: 8 paradigm shifts from strings to structures, control to coercion, features to refusals, representing compiler-first future

backlog.title: Strategic Shift: Compiler-First AI Development
backlog.description: Strategic initiative to adopt compiler-first approach for AI applications, moving from prompts-as-strings to prompts-as-code-artifacts
backlog.author: GitHub Copilot
backlog.strategic_context: Positions organization for compiler-driven AI future before it becomes industry standard (2025-2030 time horizon)
